<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Norgorberite Spy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1691)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 63</row>

**Perception** +18

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +18, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +20, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Ranged Feint** When the Norgorberite spy successfully [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) a creature, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the spy's ranged attacks as well as melee attacks.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4), _+1 [glamered](/Equipment.aspx?ID=286) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13); one spy carries a [greater cognitive mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=87) and the other carries a vial of [slumber wine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=128), but the labels on each are switched.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 29 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 170

**Reaper's Protection** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Trigger** The spy is about to attempt a saving throw; **Effect** The spy touches their religious symbol of Norgorber and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering save.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Quick Draw** <actions string="Single Action" />  The Norgorberite spy Interacts to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The Norgorberite spy deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures or creatures within reach of at least two of their allies.

**Surprise Attack**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the Norgorberite spy

</column>
name: Norgorberite Spy
